title: Readout of Vice President Harris’s Call with President Macron of France | The White House
content: Vice President Kamala Harris today spoke with President Emmanuel Macron of France. The Vice President reiterated her strong support for the close alliance between the United States and France, and congratulated the President on his recent re-election. Vice President Harris and President Macron discussed their determination to continue to support the people of Ukraine in the wake of Russia’s unprovoked and unjustified invasion, as well as the global food and security challenges exacerbated by the conflict. In the aftermath of the horrific mass shooting in Buffalo, New York, they discussed the importance of combatting the epidemic of hate, violence, and racism in both countries and around the world. ###
